The hosts began brightly and after 15 minutes, Dylan Vente received a free kick in the box and he fired high into the [â€¦] The post Eredivisie Round-Up: NEC strike late to deny PSV as Utrecht also draw appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: USMNT Transfers: New twists in Ricardo Pepi saga at PSV, Gio Reyna continues to fight at Dortmund, Caleb Wiley on the move
arts.sum: The USMNT Transfer Notebook tracks American player movements, with latest developments for those in the U.S. national team pool We're just days away from the end of the transfer window and, at times, it looked as if sparks could fly in this final stretch.

arts.ttl: PSV to consider options after U.S.'s Ricardo Pepi knee injury
arts.sum: PSV Eindhoven coach Peter Bosz on Friday confirmed that United States men's national team striker Ricardo Pepi will be out for "a very long time" due to an unspecified knee injury and hinted that the club may need to find a replacement. Pepi scored the eventual game-winning goal in the 3-2 victory, a result that guaranteed PSV finished in the top 16 of the league phase, but he was forced to exit the match in the 76th minute after being treated for the knee injury.

arts.ttl: Champions League Playoff Draw: Milan v Feynoord, Juventus v PSV and Atalanta v Brugge
arts.sum: The UEFA Champions League 2024-2025 season is set to enter its knockout stages, with the playoff draw determining the path for teams that finished between 9th and 24th place in the league phase. The post Champions League Playoff Draw: Milan v Feynoord, Juventus v PSV and Atalanta v Brugge appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Champions League draw LIVE with Liverpool, Arsenal and Villa's paths and Man City's huge tie
arts.sum: While eight clubs have already booked their place in the Champions League's round of 16, another 16 - including some of the competition's biggest hitters - face a play-off round

arts.ttl: Source: US's Ricardo Pepi (knee) out 1-3 months
arts.sum: PSV Eindhoven and United States men's national team striker Ricardo Pepi could be looking at an extended spell on the sidelines after injuring his knee Wednesday in a Champions League match against Liverpool, a source with knowledge of the situation confirmed to ESPN. Pepi scored the eventual game-winning goal in the 3-2 victory over Liverpool, a result that guaranteed PSV finished in the top 16 of the league phase, but he was forced to exit the match in the 76th minute after being treated for the knee injury.
